resources.string:
You can use this application to controll your phone functions uing SMS. Select the function which you need to controll and set the code.When you send a SMS with that code to your phone It will trigger that relevent function.

 1. Ringtone - This will change your vibrate mode to full volume ring mode.

 2. Wifi - This will turn on your WiFi

 3. Location - This will send your phone last known location back to the phone which you sent a SMS.

 This application user SMS read and send permissions and Paid version use phone Call phone permission to take call when action trigger.
 I will guarantee this app will not share or logs any of your SMS and Phone logs.
